description:
Our place is close to Prospect Park, The Q and B Train. Restaurants, bars, cafes, stores and more. 25 min from Manhattan. You’ll love my place because its a Great location in a bustling neighborhood on the park. The apt is big and airy with lots of windows and a large balcony with a BBQ ready to go. Lots of light and windows and a pretty good kitchen to boot. Large TV and comfy couch, plants and more.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Q/B train 2 blocks away as well as Shuttle train that connects to 2/3 4/5 and C trains. There is also a bus stop across he street
name: Large 1 Bedroom near Prospect Park
review: So cute apartment in a good location, totally suited all our needs :)
